name: 卡牌缔造者-CardMaker
description:
Overview:

This is a Rogue + Hearthstone like card game and a card making tool, you can play with all kinds of DIY cards from players in the creative workshop in addition to the official cards, you can also realize your own ideas, read the simple and easy to use script interface, a map and a few lines of code can realize your whims.

Features:


-Different from previous card-based Rogue games that focus on skill cards, but rather creature-driven battles. It is also convenient for players to DIY to expand various interesting creatures.



-Rich card mechanism, all kinds of creatures and powers can be expanded



-Easy and flexible interface, a few lines of code in a picture, a few minutes to achieve an interesting card
